title: Development of Integrated Physics Instructional Design Modules for Education for Sustainable Development (ESD)

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level physics knowledge and general understanding of sustainable development
context.additional_context: Program strengthening competencies in ESD integration strategies within physics curriculum for in-service secondary teachers

learning_goals: Students can create a physics lesson design document integrating ESD based on the ASSURE model
Students can derive and connect sustainable development values in physics topics such as energy transition and renewable energy
Students can establish an evaluation plan for learning effectiveness using the sustainable development value comprehension assessment tool (UPNK)

resources: Education for Sustainable Development (ESD) Resources (e.g., UNESCO ESD Guidelines)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
